00034 char exec_cmd()
00035 {
00036         printf("\n");
00037 
00038         if (strcmp("exit", Pointer) == 0)
00039         {
00040                 exit(-1);
00041         }
00042         else if (strcmp("help", Pointer) == 0)
00043         {
00044                 printf("Line - Command line tool for SimpleOS\n");
00045                 printf("Line - Executable compiled for Kernel version %i.%i codename \"%s\"\n", KVERSION_WHOLE, KVERSION_FRACTION, KVERSION_CODENAME);
00046                 printf("Compiled as part of OS version %i.%i.%i codename \"%s\"\n", OS_VERSION_MAJOR, OS_VERSION_MINOR, OS_VERSION_REVISION, OS_VERSION_CODENAME);
00047                 printf("free - list memory information\n");
00048                 printf("reboot - request the kernel to reboot the system\n");
00049                 printf("uptime - Lists the seconds minutes and hours the system has been up for\n");
00050                 printf("lproc - Lists information about all scheduled processes\n");
00051                 printf("debug_on - Turns debug mode on\n");
00052                 printf("debug_off - Turns debug mode off\n");
00053                 printf("cls - Clear the screen\n");
00054         }
00055         else if (strcmp("cls", Pointer) == 0)
00056         {
00057                 clearscreen();
00058         }
00059         else if (strcmp("debug_on", Pointer) == 0)
00060         {
00061                 requestSystemDebugMode();
00062         }
00063         else if (strcmp("debug_off", Pointer) == 0)
00064         {
00065                 requestDisableSystemDebugMode();
00066         }
00067         else if (strcmp("gameoflife", Pointer) == 0)
00068         {
00069                 systemRunNewProcess("./system/root/GameOfLife");
00070                 exit(1);
00071         }
00072         else if (strcmp("base", Pointer) == 0)
00073         {
00074                 systemRunNewProcess("./system/root/Base");
00075                 exit(1);
00076         }
00077         else if (strcmp("uptime", Pointer) == 0)
00078         {
00079                 unsigned long ticks = clock();
00080                 unsigned long ticks_per_second = cps;
00081 
00082                 unsigned int seconds = 0;
00083                 unsigned int minutes = 0;
00084                 unsigned int hours = 0;
00085 
00086                 seconds = ticks / ticks_per_second; //Use this temporarely
00087 
00088                 hours = (seconds / (60 * 60));
00089                 
00090                 unsigned int remainder = seconds % (60 * 60);
00091 
00092                 minutes = remainder / 60;
00093 
00094                 seconds = remainder % 60;
00095 
00096                 printf("The system has been alive for %i hours %i minutes and %i seconds\n", hours, minutes, seconds);
00097         }
00098         else if (strcmp("armageddon", Pointer) == 0)
00099         {
00100                 printf("Self-Destruct sequence activated\n");
00101 
00102                 unsigned int tdeath = 16;
00103 
00104                 while (1)
00105                 {
00106                         unsigned long time_for_splode = clock() + cps;
00107                         while (time_for_splode > clock()) {}
00108                         tdeath--;
00109 
00110                         printf("%i Seconds remaining\n", tdeath);
00111 
00112                         if (tdeath == 0)
00113                                 break;
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 printf("Hah, just kidding\n");
00117         }
00118         else if (strcmp("lproc", Pointer) == 0)
00119         {
00120                 printf("Listing active processes\n");
00121 
00122                 unsigned int iterator = 0;
00123 
00124                 while (1)
00125                 {
00126                         int pid = getProcessID(iterator);
00127 
00128                         if (pid == -1) break;
00129 
00130                         process_info_t info = getProcessInfo(pid);
00131                         printf("Process %i Name %s Time %i\n", info.pID, info.Name, info.processingTime);
00132 
00133                         iterator++;
00134                 }
00135 
00136                 printf("Done listing %i processes\n", iterator);
00137 
00138         } else if (strcmp("free", Pointer) == 0) {
00139                 printf("Free memory information\n");
00140                 MEM_LOC free_frames = getNumberOfFreeFrames();
00141                 MEM_LOC page_size = getPageSize();
00142                 printf("%i free frames of memory\n", free_frames);
00143                 printf("Each frame is %i bytes of memory\n", page_size);
00144                 printf("Therefore there are %i MBs of memory left\n", (free_frames * page_size) / 1024 / 1024);
00145 
00146         } else if (strcmp("reboot", Pointer) == 0) {
00147                 requestReboot();
00148         } else {
00149                 printf("Command %s not found\n", Pointer);
00150         }
00151 
00152         return 0;
00153 }

00161 int main(int argc, void* argv)
00162 {
00163         c_ptr = 0;
00164         postboxSetFlags(INPUT_BIT);
00165 
00166         cps = getClocksPerSecond();
00167 
00168         printf("Line - Executable compiled for Kernel version %i.%i codename \"%s\"\n", KVERSION_WHOLE, KVERSION_FRACTION, KVERSION_CODENAME);
00169         printf("Compiled as part of OS version %i.%i.%i codename \"%s\"\n", OS_VERSION_MAJOR, OS_VERSION_MINOR, OS_VERSION_REVISION, OS_VERSION_CODENAME);
00170 
00171         printf("Line.x:> ");
00172         Pointer[0] = '\0';
00173 
00174         for (;;)
00175         {
00176 
00177                 if (postboxHasNext() == 1)
00178                 {
00179                         process_message message;
00180                         message = postboxGetNext();
00181                         
00182                         if (message.ID == INPUT_MESSAGE)
00183                         {
00184                                 //Its a input message alright
00185                                 if (message.message_data[0] == DEVICE_KEYBOARD)
00186                                 {
00187                                         //its a keyboard message even!
00188                                         char C = getAsciFromScancode(message.message_data[1], message.message_data[2]);
00189 
00190                                         if (C == '\r')
00191                                         {       
00192                                                 if (c_ptr != 0)
00193                                                 {
00194                                                         if (exec_cmd() == 1)
00195                                                                 break;
00196 
00197                                                         c_ptr = 0;
00198                                                         Pointer[c_ptr] = '\0';
00199                                                         printf("Line.x:> ");
00200                                                 }
00201                                         }
00202                                         else if (C == '\b')
00203                                         {
00204                                                 if (c_ptr != 0)
00205                                                 {
00206                                                         printf("\b \b");
00207                                                         c_ptr--;
00208                                                         Pointer[c_ptr] = '\0';
00209                                                 }
00210                                         }
00211                                         else
00212                                         {
00213                                                 Pointer[c_ptr] = C;
00214                                                 Pointer[c_ptr + 1] = '\0';
00215                                                 c_ptr++;
00216                                                 printf("%c", C);
00217                                         }
00218                                 }
00219                                 else if (message.message_data[0] == DEVICE_MOUSE)
00220                                 {
00221 
00222                                         cls();
00223 
00224                                         //Message from a the mouse
00225                                         printf("Message Data: %i %i ", message.message_data[2], message.message_data[3]);
00226 
00227                                         if (message.message_data[1] & BIT_0 == 1)
00228                                         {
00229                                                 printf("LBTN");
00230                                         }
00231                                         printf("\n");
00232                                 }
00233                         }
00234                 }
00235 
00236                 sleepProcess();
00237         }
00238 
00239         return 1;
00240 }

00242 void _start(int argc, void* argv)
